task.title: Retrieving the supported light targets of a device

context.p: SupportedTargets() call retrieves the supported light targets of the device.
context.note: Any attempt to use or reserve unsupported target fails with KErrNotSupported.
context.p: The following code snippet demonstrates how to retrieve the supported light targets of a device:
context.codeblock: // The method returns a bitmask containing supported light targets. TInt supportedTargets = iLight->SupportedTargets();
